data.title: Did all great filmmakers attend film school?
data.meta_description:
Answer (1 of 3): No, not all great filmmakers attended film school. Many successful directors either attended film school or learned through other means. Here are some examples of both:

Attended Film School

1. Martin Scorsese: Graduated from NYU's Tisch School of the Arts, where he made several...
